climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: The complete set utilizes 100% Microfiber. Whole-piece microfiber fill in the comforter provides exceptional warmth and cozy. The front side just has the “wrinkled look” and the underside is smooth. Solid stitching for the comforter largely improves its durability, well-preventing bunching and creates a lightweight quilt for year-round comforts.

Elaborate Design: The elastic deep pocket fitted sheet fits mattress max up to 16" deep. That can always keep non-slip no matter how you twist and turn in your bed. Soft white tones add a touch of color to this elegantly simplified look

What You Can Get: Queen Size 7-Piece bed in a bag includes - 1x Comforter(88" * 88") + 2x Pillow shams( 20" * 26")+ 2x Pillow cases( 20" * 30")+ 1x Flat sheet(90" * 102")+ 1x Fitted sheet(60" * 80") - Our bed in a bag is packaged in a vacuum bag, so you can dry it in low heat or tap the comforter gently while baking it in the sun to fluffy again.

Easy Care: The bedding sets are machine washable which can save you more time and energy. For year round softness and prevent pilling up, it's highly recommend to wash it in the gentle cycle with cold water, sun-dry or tumble dry in low when needed. Let our comforter sheets keep providing you and your family with cozy sleeping

Satisfactory Service and Reminder: The product color may look vastly different under different lighting conditions. As your satisfaction is of the utmost importance to us. Cozylux is committed to offering you premium products and a caring service. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about our products. We would try our best to solve problems as soon as possible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely beautiful set! Must buy!
reviews.reviewText: It looks just like the picture. The sheets are quality and really soft. The comforter is light weight but heavy enough for chilly nights. I added a couple of accent pillows. Absolutely beautiful! You will not be disappointed with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright, Light & Silky
reviews.reviewText: Great deal! The comforter is airy and silky. Not too heavy, love the design. The California King really is true to size and fits perfectly. The fitted sheets are not the best quality but for that price you can’t beat it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Hot sleepers! So Cozy!
reviews.reviewText: I have probably purchased over 10 different comforters from Amazon this past year. All have ended up in storage since I’d wake up in a sweat from them. This set is amazing! I can sleep comfortably and it feels super soft and cozy! It’s also super cute and I love that it comes in different colours and includes a sheet set! Im just hoping it doesn’t pill quickly. For the price, this is a great deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I usually cannot sleep under comforters because of pain in my feet. This is so light and warm and cozy. I am very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeds my Expectation
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this comforter/sheet set because I was looking for a light blue, lightweight comforter for our captain’s bed since we have to tuck all sides under the mattress. The sheets were just a “freebie”, as far as I was concerned, that I could really careless about. However, I was pleasantly surprised by how much we like them. I immediately laundered everything before putting them on the bed (cool water, delicate cycle, low dry). I removed the sheets IMMEDIATELY from the dryer and was floored that there were no wrinkles. My high dollar, high cotton count, thicker sheets wrinkle hideously!As you can see by the pictures, these sheets appear ironed, but they’re not (I am an ironing freak, too!). These sheets are so soft, even more so than my other high dollar, high cotton count, thicker sheets. I’m shocked quite frankly, at how soft they are. Our puppy sleeps with us, too and he didn’t budge once, all night long. It’s like he found his own little piece of bed heaven and he has a very plush dog bed. I’ll add that our bed and pillows are queen size and everything fits perfectly.1). Flat sheet picture - no wrinkles2). Fitted sheet picture - no wrinkles3) Completely made bed - side view; please note the comforter isn’t supposed to look “wrinkle” free, this is how it is designed4). Completely made bed - full on viewWhat really surprised me is after sleeping on the sheets, as I was making the bed the next morning, the sheets are still NOT wrinkled! WHAT! Okay, I’m sold! In saying that, you should be aware that the sheets are thin & I mean THIN. I don’t know how they’ll hold up over the long haul, but after one washing they look great. We live in a year-round warm environment, so we like that they are thin, but if you live in a cold environment, you may only use these in the summertime.Would I buy another set of these sheets? Heck yes! However, I will wait a few months because I want to see how they hold up over several washings. The thinness still concerns me a bit, so I do recommend washing them on delicate cycle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t say enough!
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what it looks like in the photos AFTER you wash it. Sheets, pillow cases and comforter are super soft and not heavy at all, and as a hot sleeper this is exactly what I was looking for. For the price the quality is amazing and exceeds all of my expectations!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Stylish, lightweight and comfortable. I love the ribbed pattern so it shows less wrinkles. Very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great price for a bed in a bag but not great quality
reviews.reviewText: The sheets were nice and soft but the bedding itself is just okay. The color was not a stark white like I wanted but that’s just a matter of preference. The comforter is thin which is fine for warmer months but not New England winters. It does not resemble a soft cotton seer-sucker comforter at all but more of a synthetic slippery feel that ends up sliding off the bed if it’s not tucked under the mattress. It serves its purpose for now but will get a replacement at another time.
